HomePage.heroTitle: Ship features faster with autonomous AI agents.
HomePage.heroDesc: Describe your feature, and watch a swarm of specialized AI agents collaborate to write, test, and deploy production-ready code in minutes. Say goodbye to manual boilerplate.
HomePage.howItWorksDesc: Go from idea to production in three simple steps. Let the AI handle the heavy lifting while you focus on the vision.
HomePage.step1Desc: Provide a brief prompt or user story. The Context Manager automatically gathers the necessary codebase context and plans the FSD/DDD architecture.
HomePage.step2Desc: A swarm of specialized sub-agents (frontend, backend, database) are spawned to write the code simultaneously, ensuring perfect integration.
HomePage.step3Desc: The QA Agent verifies the code against rigorous tests. Review the automated Pull Request and deploy your flawless feature to production.
HomePage.roiDesc: Stop paying for boilerplate. Our Orchestrator cuts development time by 90% while keeping token costs incredibly low.
HomePage.featuresTitle: A complete platform for AI coding
HomePage.featuresDesc: Built from the ground up with a custom Vector Database, automated Context Managers, and precise multi-agent architecture.
HomePage.feature1Desc: Automatically analyzes the target codebase and proposes the optimal FSD / DDD architecture for the new feature perfectly aligned with your standards.
HomePage.feature2Desc: The Orchestrator spawns hyper-focused sub-agents leveraging specialized MCP tools for frontend, backend, or database tasks efficiently.
HomePage.feature3Desc: Every snippet of code undergoes rigorous automated testing by the QA Agent before it hits the production check-point ensuring perfection.
HomePage.techStackTitle: Generating code for a modern tech stack
HomePage.ctaDesc: Join the Orchestrator V4 and experience the future of autonomous agent-assisted development.
HomePage.footerRights: AI Orchestrator MVP. All rights reserved.

analyze.label: Analyze
analyze.promptText: "Create a sleek automated pipeline visualizer component for the landing page with Tailwind animations and a live activity stream feel."
analyze.searching: Searching vector database for relevant codebase context

verify.label: Verify
verify.description: Running E2E tests and deployment checks
